channel.title: Peter's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Peter's Sports Blog

item.title: Who is the Best Big Man in the NBA?
item.description: There are so many great big men in the NBA right now, but who is the best? Because of the recent emphasis on spacing and 3-point shooting, the role of the big man has diminished in recent years. Teams now opt for fewer “non-shooters” on the court at a time, and as a result lineups have gotten smaller. Big men in the NBA might be smaller in number today, but their impact isn’t any less.

item.title: More About Me
item.description: My name is Peter Rice and I am a Sports Journalism Major at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. I’ve had a passion for sports all my life and I want to make a career for myself in the sports industry! After graduating high school in 2018 I attended South Dakota State University for two years before transferring to UNL. While there, I was a student coach for the Jackrabbit football team where I traveled along taking video and entering stats along with various other tasks.
